Applying a steady state assumption to equation (1) and using the model 2 D/V
0 = W/τ we previously reported a mixing timescale τ ≈ 48.3 ± 4.6 years 17 from the En3 observational analysis (this result is identical for En4). We calculate τ ≈ 42.4 ± 6.8 years for the CMIP5 pre-industrial ensemble mean.
